briefTitle: Phase III Clinical Study in Patients With Mild to Severe Scalp Psoriasis

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male or non-pregnant, non-lactating females 18 years of age and older.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Females who are pregnant, lactating or likely to become pregnant during the study.

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Patients in Each Treatment Group Who Are Considered a Clinical Success
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical Success is defined by an IGA score of 0 (clear) or I (almost clear) with at least a 2 grades reduction from baseline at Day 29 Â± 2
